name: Soups
description: Refined, seasonal soups — crafted with market produce and a modern twist.

items.name: Silky Chicken & Rice
items.description: Slow-simmered broth, tender rice, confit chicken, lemon gremolata, and green garlic oil

items.name: Hearty Beef & Barley
items.description: A rustic favorite with slow-cooked beef, root vegetables, pearl barley, and fresh herbs

items.name: Roasted Tomato & Red Pepper
items.description: Charred tomatoes and sweet peppers, blended with smoked paprika and basil crème

items.name: Chilled Sweet Corn & Basil
items.description: Golden corn purée with fresh basil, chili oil, and whipped feta

items.name: Zucchini & Green Garlic
items.description: Silky summer zucchini, green garlic, lemon, and extra virgin olive oil

items.name: Heirloom Tomato & Strawberry Gazpacho
items.description: Sweet-tart blend of tomatoes and strawberries, finished with pickled shallots and mint

items.name: Leek & Potato Vichyssoise
items.description: A chilled purée of roasted leeks and new potatoes with cultured cream and chive oil

items.name: Curried Carrot & Coconut (Cold or Hot)
items.description: Spiced carrot soup with coconut milk, kaffir lime, and crispy shallots

name: Salads
description: Fresh, vibrant salads with seasonal produce, bold dressings, and modern Mediterranean flair.

items.name: Mixed Green Salad
items.description: Field greens, radish, cucumber, carrot ribbons, and champagne vinaigrette

items.name: Greek Village Salad
items.description: Heirloom tomatoes, cucumber, olives, red onion, oregano, creamy feta

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Chopped romaine, anchovy dressing, parmesan, croutons

items.name: Stone Fruit & Burrata Salad
items.description: Peaches and plums, burrata, basil, arugula, aged balsamic, toasted pistachios

items.name: Summer Beet & Citrus
items.description: Roasted beets, orange supremes, arugula, goat cheese mousse, walnut vinaigrette

items.name: Grilled Corn & Avocado Salad
items.description: Charred corn, avocado, cherry tomatoes, pickled onions, cilantro-lime vinaigrette

items.name: Quinoa & Watermelon Salad
items.description: Red quinoa, watermelon cubes, mint, feta, arugula, sherry vinaigrette

items.name: Shaved Fennel & Snap Pea Salad
items.description: Crisp peas, shaved fennel, radish, lemon-thyme vinaigrette, microgreens

name: Starters
description: A vibrant collection of spreads, small plates, and light bites to begin your journey.

items.name: Curated Cheese Board
items.description: A seasonal selection of house-aged cheeses with jams, nuts, and preserves.

items.name: Cheese & Charcuterie Board
items.description: Cheeses, cured meats, pickles, mustard, and grilled sourdough.

items.name: Greek Trio
items.description: Taramasalata, Tirokafteri, and Melitzanosalata, served with warm pita.

items.name: Spinach & Artichoke Dip
items.description: Baked with three cheeses, served with za'atar pita chips.

items.name: Mushroom Tartine
items.description: Sautéed mushrooms, truffle ricotta, and hot honey on grilled sourdough.

items.name: Goat Cheese Cake
items.description: Savory goat cheese custard with frisée, fig jam, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
items.description: Fresh herbs, rice noodles, peanut dipping sauce.

items.name: Seared Scallops
items.description: On carrot purée with crispy shallots and brown butter.

items.name: Shrimp Giuseppe
items.description: Crispy shrimp with lemony zip sauce and pickled herbs.

items.name: Mini Tuna Tartare Cones
items.description: Spicy tuna, avocado, sesame, in miso cones.

name: Main Courses
description: Refined summer dishes inspired by global cuisine, featuring house-made pasta, prime meats, and sun-kissed seasonal produce.

items.name: Summer Egg Noodles
items.description: House-made egg noodles with grilled zucchini, sweet corn, scallions, sesame, and a ginger-lime soy glaze

items.name: Grilled Vegetable Lasagna
items.description: Layers of summer squash, roasted peppers, spinach, basil ricotta, and cherry tomato sauce

items.name: Spaghetti & Summer Herb Meatballs
items.description: Beef & veal meatballs with fresh basil, mint, lemon zest, and San Marzano marinara

items.name: Shrimp Scampi Linguine
items.description: Chili-lime butter, blistered cherry tomatoes, and parsley

items.name: Summer Bolognese
items.description: Light veal and beef ragu with summer herbs and hand-cut tagliatelle

items.name: Ricotta Gnocchi with Corn & Basil
items.description: Served with charred corn, parmesan crumble, and roasted tomato vinaigrette

items.name: Herbed Chicken Supreme
items.description: Grilled chicken breast with sweet corn purée, cherry tomato vinaigrette, and baby greens

items.name: Jerk-Spiced Chicken
items.description: With pineapple-avocado salsa and island-style coconut rice

items.name: Citrus Chicken Tagine
items.description: Braised with golden apricots, preserved lemon, and summer vegetables over couscous

items.name: Mexican Pollo Asado Bowl
items.description: Grilled chicken with lime, cilantro rice, grilled corn, and roasted pepper crema

items.name: Grilled Coconut-Curry Chicken
items.description: Served with mango relish and jasmine rice salad

items.name: Lemon-Caper Chicken Piccata
items.description: With grilled broccolini and chilled olive oil potato salad

items.name: Tandoori Chicken with Cucumber Raita
items.description: Charred summer squash, pickled shallots, and coriander drizzle

items.name: Grilled Market Fish
items.description: Served over corn purée, summer bean salad, and basil oil

items.name: Crispy Skin Salmon
items.description: With red cabbage-orange slaw, lemon couscous, and saffron aioli

items.name: Tuna Tataki
items.description: Sesame-crusted with avocado crema, pickled cucumber, and citrus-soy glaze

items.name: Rib eye Steak
items.description: Grilled and sliced, served with charred corn salsa, arugula, and chimichurri

items.name: Grilled Skirt Steak
items.description: With avocado herb sauce, cherry tomato relish, and smoked sea salt

items.name: Steak au Poivre
items.description: Served summer-style with chilled potato salad and mustard greens

items.name: Filet Mignon with Summer Béarnaise
items.description: Tarragon béarnaise, zucchini ribbons, and fondant potatoes

items.name: Grilled Lamb Chops with Mint Gremolata
items.description: With baby carrots, citrus glaze, and herbed farro

items.name: Grilled Corn Risotto
items.description: Creamy arborio rice with corn, parmesan, and summer herb oil

items.name: Stuffed Portobello
items.description: Filled with lemon-herb farro, kale, and roasted pepper coulis

items.name: Five-Spice Tofu with Summer Slaw
items.description: Chili crisp tofu with citrus cabbage slaw and jasmine rice

items.name: Grilled Eggplant Stack
items.description: Layered with cashew ricotta, heirloom tomatoes, and basil-miso dressing

items.name: Sweet Potato Gnocchi
items.description: With grilled peaches, brown butter, and toasted pecans

items.name: Cauliflower Steak
items.description: Vadouvan curry, lime cashew cream, and pickled summer onions

name: Brunch
description: A vibrant summer brunch menu blending sunny flavors and seasonal produce, available Saturday and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

items.name: Summer Strata
items.description: Savory baked egg dish with zucchini, corn, cherry tomatoes, basil, and cheese over a crispy potato crust

items.name: French Omelette
items.description: Delicate omelette with your choice of fillings: smoked salmon, goat cheese, herbed cream, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, and fresh herbs. Served with a baby greens salad and toasted sourdough

items.name: Mediterranean Egg Casserole
items.description: Baked eggs with grilled eggplant, spinach, roasted peppers, and feta, finished with a light tomato glaze

items.name: Summer Quiche Selection
items.description: Choose from seasonal quiches: Heirloom Tomato & Feta, Corn & Cheddar, or Wild Mushroom & Herb, served with a mixed greens salad

items.name: Brunch Brioche Sandwich
items.description: Fried or scrambled egg, cheddar, avocado, and lemon aioli on a toasted brioche bun. Add-ons: bacon, turkey sausage, or grilled halloumi

items.name: Garden Breakfast Bowl
items.description: Scrambled eggs with roasted summer veggies, herbs, and crumbled cheese over crispy potatoes. Choice of sauces: harissa yogurt, basil pesto, or lemon tahini

items.name: Summer Yogurt Parfaits
items.description: Greek yogurt layered with stone fruit compote, citrus honey, and house-made granola

items.name: Citrus-Mint Fruit Cups
items.description: Chilled melon, berries, and citrus segments with a touch of mint syrup

items.name: Muffins & Tea Loaves
items.description: Daily-baked selections like lemon poppy seed, blueberry cornmeal, and zucchini bread

items.name: Summer Jams & Spreads
items.description: Peach-ginger jam, whipped honey butter, and seasonal preserves served with sourdough toasts

name: Desserts
description: Indulge in our decadent selection of house-made desserts.

items.name: Best Chocolate Chip Cookie
items.description: Valrhona chocolate and vanilla butter

items.name: Rich as FF$$ Brownie
items.description: Rich chocolate brownie with dulce de leche

items.name: Blondie
items.description: Chewy blondie with toasted pecans and a hint of sea salt

items.name: Oatmeal Raisin
items.description: Classic oatmeal raisin cookie with plump Black and Golden Raisins

items.name: Carrot Chamomile Layer Cake
items.description: Spiced carrot cake infused with chamomile, honey cream cheese frosting, and walnut praline

items.name: Sour Cream Pound Cake
items.description: Classic sour cream pound cake with lemon curd and lemon glaze

items.name: Tiramisu Crepe Cake
items.description: Delicate layers of coffee and cocoa crepes with mascarpone cream

items.name: Fruit and Lemon Galette
items.description: Seasonal fruit medley baked in a flaky crust with vanilla custard and lemon glaze

items.name: Seasonal Fruit Pavlova
items.description: Crisp meringue topped with seasonal fruit and vanilla custard

items.name: Creme Brulee Bambolone
items.description: Fluffy Italian doughnut filled with vanilla bean pastry cream and bruleed sugar

name: Beverages
description: A curated selection of beverages to complement your meal.

items.name: Seasonal Craft Cocktails
items.description: Ask about our rotating selection of handcrafted seasonal cocktails

items.name: Curated Wine Selection
items.description: Carefully selected wines by the bottle and by the glass to complement our menu. Please ask your server for our current list.

items.name: Artisanal Tea Service
items.description: Premium loose-leaf teas, served with house-made accompaniments

items.name: Brewed Coffee
items.description: Freshly brewed coffee

items.name: Espresso
items.description: Single or double shot

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam

items.name: Latte
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk

items.name: Freshly Squeezed Juices
items.description: Orange, Grapefruit, Apple

items.name: Sparkling Water
items.description: Perrier

items.name: Soft Drinks
items.description: Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale
